sections.heading: Double jeopardy; when not applicableA person shall not be considered as having been in jeopardy in a trial in which:(1) The court was illegally constituted or lacked jurisdiction;(2) The prosecution was dismissed because it was instituted in an improper venue; or(3) The indictment was invalid
sections.text: Double jeopardy; when not applicableA person shall not be considered as having been in jeopardy in a trial in which:(1) The court was illegally constituted or lacked jurisdiction;(2) The prosecution was dismissed because it was instituted in an improper venue; or(3) The indictment was invalid.
